channel.title: Categories on more or less insightful
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on more or less insightful

item.title: Tricky Signal Tracing in Kernel
item.description: Have you ever experienced such horrible signaling between core processes which might crash a whole system. This article is about an approach let you be safe from enermies. It’d be good for both linux distros we mainly use in laptops and embedded systems. but more comfy on the latter for a test. Someone says “Better safe than sorry”. I like that quote. Even though software world is totally chaotic on bugs, we should at least try some approaches being safe.

item.title: Vim Pinky and Programmable Keyboard
item.description: I use my left pinky to jump back and forth in vim with cscope, ctags + vim comb a lot everyday. Especially ctrl + t, o, ] and so on. However, it has been hurt slightly. I thought that it might be by the use of the pinky a lot, so that looked for a solution in Google. Firstly, I could have modified my input method program a bit such that swap between Ctrl and Caps Lock, but felt frustrated all the steps code level to testing.
